00008 void RunTimeInfo::setRunStartTime(long64 starttime) {
00009   int theTime[2]; 
00010   convertlong6422int(starttime, theTime);
00011   obj()->setIntVal(kRunTimeStartMSB, theTime[0]);
00012   obj()->setIntVal(kRunTimeStartLSB, theTime[1]);
00013 }
00014 
00015 void RunTimeInfo::setRunStopTime(long64 stoptime) {
00016   int theTime[2]; 
00017   convertlong6422int(stoptime, theTime);
00018   obj()->setIntVal(kRunTimeStopMSB, theTime[0]);
00019   obj()->setIntVal(kRunTimeStopLSB, theTime[1]);
00020 }
00021 
00022   long64 RunTimeInfo::getRunStartTime(){
00023     long64 timemsb = static_cast<long64>(getIntVal(kRunTimeStartMSB));
00024     long64 timelsb = static_cast<long64>(getIntVal(kRunTimeStartLSB));
00025     LCTime timemsb_lctime( static_cast<long64>( (timemsb << 32) & 0xFFFFFFFF00000000LL )  );
00026     long64 finaltime = ( ( (timemsb << 32 ) & 0xFFFFFFFF00000000LL )  | (timelsb &0xFFFFFFFFLL)  );
00027     return finaltime;
00028   }
00029 
00030 
00031   long64 RunTimeInfo::getRunStopTime(){
00032     long64 timemsb = static_cast<long64>(getIntVal(kRunTimeStopMSB)); 
00033     long64 timelsb = static_cast<long64>(getIntVal(kRunTimeStopLSB));
00034 
00035     long64 finaltime = ( ( (timemsb  << 32 )  &0xFFFFFFFF00000000LL  ) | (timelsb&0xFFFFFFFFLL) );
00036     return finaltime;
00037   }
00038 
00039 
00040   void  RunTimeInfo::convertlong6422int(long64 inptime, int t[]) {
00041     t[0] = static_cast<int>( (inptime&0xFFFFFFFF00000000LL) >> 32 );
00042     t[1] = static_cast<int>( (inptime&0xFFFFFFFFLL) );
00043   }
00044

00046   void RunTimeInfo::print(  std::ostream& os ){
00047     
00048     LCTime starttime(getRunStartTime());
00049     LCTime stoptime(getRunStopTime());
00050     os << " Starttime: " <<   starttime.getDateString() << std::endl;
00051     os << " Stoptime: " <<   stoptime.getDateString() << std::endl;
00052   }
